==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|あま|てらす|yomi=k}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=あまてらす}}. Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あまてらす|天|tr1=ama|t1=sky, the heavens|照らす|tr2=terasu|t2=to illuminate something}}.

===Proper noun===
[[File:Amaterasu cave edit2.jpg|thumb|350 px|The Sun goddess emerging out of a cave, bringing sunlight back to the universe]]
{{ja-pos|proper|あまてらす|アマテラス}}

# {{lb|ja|Japanese mythology|Shinto|sort=あまてらす}} [[Amaterasu]], the [[Japanese]] [[sun]] [[goddess]]
# {{lb|ja|poetic|sort=あまてらす}} the [[Sun]]
